name: Bathroom Tycoon
description:
Important: Right click a bathroom to change its admission cost. 

Its like Rollercoaster Tycoon with only bathrooms or the Sims with only bladder. The game still needs some work but it is silly. 

Guests: arrive at the park looking for a bathroom. Over time, their bladder rating increases.  

Trees: Attracts guest to the park. Can prevent nearby guests from leaving before  using a bathroom.

Fountains: Cause nearby guests' bladder rating to increase.

Bathrooms: Your source of profits. Guests are willing to pay more the high their bladder rating is.

Created for Eeekly Game Jam 143: Theme: Running Water.
